5-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(t.title) AS typical_european_movie
 FROM sampled_company_type_1 AS ct,
 sampled_info_type_1 AS it,
 sampled_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
 sampled_movie_info_1 AS mi,
 sampled_title_1 AS t
 WHERE t.id = mi.movie_id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
 AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
 AND it.id = mi.info_type_id
 AND ct.kind = 'distributors'
 AND mc.note LIKE '%V%'
 AND mc.note LIKE '%7%'
 AND mi.info IN ('The character of Kessler is loosely based on Nazi war criminal Klaus Barbie.', 'Spain:11 May 1966', 'USA:15 July 1987', '14 October 1966 -', 'CAD 7,000')
 AND t.production_year > 1976;

 FROM sampled_company_type_1 AS ct,

 AND it.id = mi.info_type_id
 AND ct.kind = 'distributors'
 AND mc.note LIKE '%e%'
 AND mc.note LIKE '%d%'
 AND mi.info IN ('Several dialogue changes were made for the 1997 Special Edition: - Before Rogue 2 is hit by a laser blast at the Battle of Hoth, Luke says "This is it!" when before he said nothing. - In the asteroid field, C-3PO says, "This is suicide. There''s nowhere to go." Before all he said was, "This is suicide." - On Dagobah, after R2-D2 is spit out of the swamp, when Luke picks him up he says, "You were lucky to get out of there." In the original version he says, "You''re lucky you don''t taste very good." - During Luke''s training on Dagobah, as he''s running through the woods Yoda says, "Yes, run!" In the original version he''s silent. - For some reason the stormtrooper''s voice who shoots C-3PO on Cloud City has been dubbed over from the original voice. - During Luke''s fight with Vader you can now hear Luke grunting as he falls down the steps in the freezing chamber. - Possibly the most obvious change is Luke''s yelling as he falls down the cavern after fighting Vader. - After the duel, Vader is seen walking down a hallway and says, "Alert my Star Destroyer to prepare for my arrival." In the original version he simply says, "Bring my shuttle."', 'MET:1918 m', 'USA:30 August 1988', 'UK:13 November 1968', '1971 - 1976')
 AND t.production_year > 1979;
